sourcesContent:
<template lang="html">
  <v-card v-if="chartData != null" >
      <AABarChart
        :chartData="chartData"
        :options="chartOptions"
        :height="150"
        ref="AABarChart"
        :key="AAKey"
      >
    </AABarChart>

  </v-card>
</template>

<script>
import AABarChart from "@/components/AABarChart.vue";
import { apiService } from "@/common/api.service.js";

export default {
  name: "PlatformAAChartSummary",
  inject: ["scenarioId"],
  props: {
    platform: {
      type: Object,
      required: true,
    },
  },
  data() {
    return {
      AAKey:0,
      RPAANames: [],
      AASummary: [],
      scenario: {},
      chartOptions: {
        scales: {
            yAxes: [{
                ticks: {
                    beginAtZero: true,
                    maxTicksLimit: 6,
                    callback: function (value) {
                      return value.toLocaleString('en-US', {style:'percent'});
                    }
                }
            }],
            xAxes: [{
                ticks: {
                  maxRotation: 0 // angle in degrees
                }
            }],
        },
        title: {
          display: true,
          text: "Asset Allocation",
        },
        legend: {
          position: 'top',
          labels: {
            fontColor: 'grey'
          },
          onHover: function(e) {
            e.target.style.cursor = 'pointer';
          },
          onClick: function(e, legendItem) {
            var index = legendItem.datasetIndex;
            var ci = this.chart;
            var meta = ci.getDatasetMeta(index);

              if (meta.hidden == true) {
                meta.hidden = false
              } else {
                meta.hidden = true;
              }
            ci.update();
          }
        },
        hover: {
         onHover: function(e) {
            var point = this.getElementAtEvent(e);
            if (!point.length) e.target.style.cursor = 'default';
         }
       }
      }
    };
  },
  components: {
    AABarChart
  },
  computed: {
    customName: function (){
      if (this.platform.name == null) {
        return this.platform.custom_name;
      } else if (this.platform.name) {
        return this.platform.name.name;
      } else {
        return "Loading...";
      }
    },
    riskProfile() {
      if (this.scenario.risk_profile != undefined) {
        return this.scenario.risk_profile;
      } else {
        return {}
      }
    },
    nameSet: function (){
      let AANameList = {};
      let checkList = []
      for (let i = 0; i < this.RPAANames.length; i++) {
        let found = false;
        let aaName = this.RPAANames[i];
          if (checkList.includes(aaName.custom_name)) {
            found = true;
          }
          if (!found) {
            // THE SPACE ADDED BELOW ALLOWS THE OBJECT TO RETAIN
            // ORDERING OF ITS INTEGER PROPERTIES. THE VUE CONSOLE REMOVES THIS
            // SPACE BUT BROWSER READS IT CORRECTLY.
            AANameList[' '+aaName.id] = aaName.custom_name;
            found = false;
            checkList.push(aaName.custom_name);
          }
      }
      return (AANameList)
    },
    RPArray() {
      if (this.riskProfile.allocations != null) {
        let result = this.riskProfile.allocations.map(a => Number(a.percentage) );
        return result;
      } else {
        return []
      }
    },
    AArray() {
      let result = []
      let found = false;
      for (let key in this.nameSet) {
        for (let i=0; i < this.AASummary.length; i++) {
          if (key == this.AASummary[i].id) {
            result.push(Number(this.AASummary[i].aa_total / this.platform.platform_total))
            found = true
            break
          }
        }
        if (!found) {
          result.push(0);
        }
      }
      return result;
    },
    chartData(){
      return {
        labels: Object.values(this.nameSet),
        datasets: [
          {
            data: this.RPArray,
            backgroundColor: 'rgba(0,128,128,0.2)',
            borderColor: 'rgba(0,128,128,1)',
            borderWidth: 1,
            label: "Risk Profile"
          },
          {
            data: this.AArray,
            backgroundColor: 'rgba(255, 99, 132, 0.2)',
            borderColor: 'rgba(255, 99, 132, 1)',
            borderWidth: 1,
            label: this.customName
          }
        ]
      }
    },
  },
  watch: {
    platform () {
      this.getAASummary();
    },
  },
  methods: {
    forceRerender(){
      this.AAKey += 1;
    },
    getAASummary() {
      if (this.platform != null) {
        if (this.platform.id != null) {
          let endpoint = `/api/scenarios/${this.scenarioId}/platforms/${this.platform.id}/aasummary/`;
          apiService(endpoint).then(data => {
            this.AASummary = data.results;
          });
        }
      }
    },
    getRPAANameData() {
      let endpoint = `/api/activeriskprofilenames/`;
      apiService(endpoint).then(data => {
        this.RPAANames = data.results;
      });
    },
    getScenarioData() {
      let endpoint = `/api/scenarios/${this.scenarioId}/`;
      apiService(endpoint).then(data => {
          this.scenario = data;
          this.getRPAANameData();
      });
    },
  },
  mounted() {
    this.getScenarioData();
    this.getAASummary();
  }
};
</script>
